function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Restricted sharing of critical health data between economies creates barriers to addressing global health challenges.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global movement of people leading to enhanced transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data sharing challenges in public health surveillance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Air transportation facilitating rapid spread of coronavirus","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of international collaboration in health policies and protocols","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Less preparedness of global cities due to lack of information on outbreak issues","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Historical delays in identifying and addressing previous outbreaks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of vital information about the ease of spread of the virus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in data access due to sensitivity for national security reasons","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Significant impacts on local economies due to disease outbreaks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases such as zika virus, ebola virus, and coronavirus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restricted data and information sharing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fear among travelers due to outbreak spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hurdles pertaining to sharing of information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data collection from multiple sources in urban areas increases the risk of contagion spread through contact with surfaces or individuals carrying the virus.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of diverse data sources in smart city networks increases the complexity of tracking and tracing potential infectious cases, leading to delays in containment efforts.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of wearable urban health sensors without specific virus outbreak tracking capabilities may result in delayed detection of early symptoms and contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through connected health care devices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmitted majorly through human-to-human contact","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for anonymizing medical data to ensure data privacy and security","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of medical data with smart city operations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Geography-restricted communications of health devices limit data sharing and disease monitoring.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Separate corporations maintaining unique data processing standards limits interoperability and data sharing.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of standardized protocols and networks hinders effective surveillance and response to contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of universal standards for data sharing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate levels of trust and transparency","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of observance of regulatory practices and international healthcare guidelines","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate integration of technologies for sharing health information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative outcomes from technological integration","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardization between smart city technology suppliers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on technological backbone for early detection and management of virus outbreaks","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of democratization in the smart city technology sphere","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increasing urban conflicts and violence due to limited resources and inequalities in provision of services.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased risk of violence prompted by forced evictions, land conflicts, and resource scarcity in cities.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Environmental degradation and safety concerns from natural disasters like flooding and extreme heat waves","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emphasis on smart sensors and devices leads to privacy concerns","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on advanced technologies introduces vulnerability to cyber attacks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal access to smart city technologies exacerbates urban safety disparities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to smart city infrastructure and iot devices, leading to potential intrusion and exploitation of personal data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of iot devices and systems due to heterogeneity of protocols, leading to potential interference and security breaches","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in ensuring the security and safety of cities due to the combined adoption of safe city and smart city concepts","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased conflicts and crimes due to disparities and deprivations in cities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of safety and resilience in cities affecting sustainable development","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unauthorized access to surveillance data due to coupling of video surveillance and cloud storage","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential privacy concerns arising from the use of surveillance and data extraction technologies in urban developments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of data breaches and system infiltration in safe city concepts, leading to compromised security of urban systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in managing the safe city concept due to lack of uniformity in protocols and centralized networks, leading to increased complexity and cost","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about private data collection and monitoring in urban areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misleading information and propaganda in the context of safe city projects","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privatization of data collection and delegation to third parties","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
